heading: HB04333
0: AN ACT TO ADOPT THE RULES OF LEGAL OR INTERSTATE SUCCESSION UNDER THE CIVIL CODE, AS AMENDED, IN THE ENTITLEMENT OF PENSIONS AND OTHER BENEFITS OF POLICE OFFICERS WHO DIED IN THE LINE OF DUTY AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE FIRST PARAGRAPH OF SECTION 41, ARTICLE XI OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NUMBER 1184 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "INTEGRATED NATIONAL POLICE PERSONNEL PROFESSIONALIZATION LAW OF 1977" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2016-11-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04333
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ADOPT THE RULES OF LEGAL OR INTERSTATE SUCCESSION UNDER THE CIVIL CODE, AS AMENDED, IN THE ENTITLEMENT OF PENSIONS AND OTHER BENEFITS OF POLICE OFFICERS WHO DIED IN THE LINE OF DUTY AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE FIRST PARAGRAPH OF SECTION 41, ARTICLE XI OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NUMBER 1184 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "INTEGRATED NATIONAL POLICE PERSONNEL PROFESSIONALIZATION LAW OF 1977" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BILLONES, EMMANUEL A.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-09
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2016-11-15
